 ******************************************************************************************************************** */import{TextContent}from'@cloudscape-design/components';import Container from'@cloudscape-design/components/container';import SpaceBetween from'@cloudscape-design/components/space-between';import Status from'./components/Status';import threatFieldData from'../../../data/threatFieldData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Metrics=_ref=>{let{statement,onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SpaceBetween,{direction:"vertical",size:"s",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Inputs for mitigation"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.threat_source.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('threat_source'),completed:!!statement.threatSource}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.prerequisites.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('prerequisites'),completed:!!statement.prerequisites}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.threat_action.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('threat_action'),completed:!!statement.threatAction}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TextContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Inputs for prioritization"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.threat_impact.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('threat_impact'),completed:!!statement.threatImpact}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.impacted_goal.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('impacted_goal'),completed:!!statement.impactedGoal&&statement.impactedGoal.length>0}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Status,{label:threatFieldData.impacted_assets.displayTitle,onClick:()=>onClick('impacted_assets'),completed:!!statement.impactedAssets&&statement.impactedAssets.length>0})]})});};export default Metrics;
